errors.name: Accounts - February - Payable
errors.originalExpression: SELECT SUM(amount) as value FROM dbo.payable_accounts WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE MONTH(transaction_date) = 2 AND YEAR(transaction_date) = YEAR(GETDATE())
errors.fixedExpression: SELECT ISNULL(SUM(amount), 0) as value FROM dbo.payable_accounts WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE MONTH(transaction_date) = 2 AND YEAR(transaction_date) = YEAR(GETDATE())

errors.name: Inventory - Columbus - In Stock

errors.name: Key Metrics - Total Sales - Value
errors.originalExpression: SELECT SUM(order_amt) as value FROM dbo.oe_hdr WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE order_date >= DATEADD(day, -30, GETDATE())
errors.fixedExpression: SELECT ISNULL(SUM(order_amt), 0) as value FROM dbo.oe_hdr WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE order_date >= DATEADD(day, -30, GETDATE())

errors.name: Key Metrics - Average Order Value - Value
errors.originalExpression: SELECT AVG(order_amt) as value FROM dbo.oe_hdr WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE order_date >= DATEADD(day, -30, GETDATE())
errors.fixedExpression: SELECT ISNULL(AVG(order_amt), 0) as value FROM dbo.oe_hdr WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE order_date >= DATEADD(day, -30, GETDATE())
